snippet: Mr. Schmidt was a winner of many landmark cases in a court system known for “telephone justice,” in which party bosses dictated verdicts.
abstract: Yuri M Schmidt, human rights lawyer who represented critics of the Russian government and others accused of political crimes, dies at age 75.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Schmidt was a winner of many landmark cases in a court system known for “telephone justice,” in which party bosses dictated verdicts.

headline.seo: Yuri M. Schmidt, Russian Human Rights Lawyer, Is Dead at 75
headline.main: Yuri M. Schmidt, Rights Lawyer in Russia, Dies at 75
headline.print_headline: Yuri M. Schmidt, 75, Rights Lawyer in Russia
